scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy notion-cookbook-fetcher --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=europe-west3 --source=. --entry-point=updateGET --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --env-vars-file .env.yaml --set-secrets 'NOTION_ACCESS_TOKEN=notion-access-token:2' --memory 1G
scripts.gcp-build: npx playwright install && npm run build
